languageKey.label: The speaker, or representative of the sermon, if applicable.
A speaker
Hides this record from front end display.
This checkbox will hide or unhide a speaker from the users of your site. You can use this to temporarily hide this record from the Front End while editing it in the Back End.
tx_wecsermons_speakers:islinked
Enables or disables linking to the single view of this record on the Front End.
This checkbox allows you to have a speaker entered into the SMS and displayed on the Front End, but disallow users to view the speakers detail page by disabling the link to its single view.
tx_wecsermons_speakers:hidden
The full name, or display name, of the speaker
Last name of the speaker
First name of the speaker
E-mail address of the speaker
Speaker's personal web address (URL)
The URL is a web address that can be the speakers home page, blog profile page, etc.
Photograph of the speaker.
The photograph can be a head shot or any other picture the speaker would like displayed.
Text used int the Alt and Title attributes of a speaker's photo
Alt attributes are displayed in place of the photo if the browser can not display the image, while the title attribute is used as a "tooltip" pop-up.
